name: Rhythm Mythril Fever
description:
Rhythm Heaven Mythril Fever!

Made in 48hrs for the Cam Game Jam 2023

Left mouse button to mine rocks, Right mouse button to operate machines. Mining beats are signified by falling rocks, machine beats are signified by a red light on the machine.

Credits
  • StolenCheese  - Programming, Design, Environment art
  • MediumMonty - Vehicle art
Attributions:
